definition: diligent/industrious (in one's studies)/to study hard/to make great effort
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: He learned carelessly and was not hard-working at all.
sentences.chinese: 他学习马马虎虎，很不用功。

sentences.english: They are to live up to expectations, in our study hard, under-funded, university.
sentences.chinese: 他们很争气，在我们的资助下用功读书，考上大学。

sentences.english: But yesterday I promised him to work harder.
sentences.chinese: 但是，昨天我向他保证要更用功念书。

sentences.english: He would learn more quickly if he worked harder.
sentences.chinese: 如果再用功些，他会学得更快。

sentences.english: These components provide general utility functions.
sentences.chinese: 这些组件提供普通的实用功能。

sentences.english: He studies very hard every day.
Unless you work harder, you will not pass the examination.
sentences.chinese: 如果不加劲用功，你就不能通过考试。

sentences.english: She is always hardworking and she always keeps her promise.
sentences.chinese: 她总用功，她总是保持她的诺言。

sentences.english: Peggy studies hard in order to pass the entrance exam.
sentences.chinese: 佩吉为了要通过入学考而用功读书。

sentences.english: Six practical function of living, Special query Voltage and electric quantity, saving power visible.
sentences.chinese: 六大生活实用功能，特设电压电量查询，省电看得见。

sentences.english: You've been working hard all day and you just can't push it anymore.
sentences.chinese: 你已经用功了一整天，你累得完全不想再动弹了。

sentences.english: What worries him most is his son not studying hard.
sentences.chinese: 最使他担忧的事是他儿子不用功读书。

sentences.english: Between this Jing Yujing distance also is we studies hard the place.
sentences.chinese: 这“景”与“境”之间的距离也便是我们的用功之处。
首先是对实用功能的轻视。

sentences.english: Tom is too hard-working not to pass the exam.
sentences.chinese: 汤姆这么用功，哪有考不及格的道理。

sentences.english: Dean aim to study on a scholarship.
sentences.chinese: 狄恩打算用功以得奖学金。

definition: to make an effort/to push for sth/to work hard
to read a book/to study/to attend school
to forge ahead vigorously/to dedicate oneself to progress
to make progress/to do better/fig. ambitious to improve oneself/to move forwards
